DOC.brief_summary: To determine baseline tear thickness improvement immediately post installation two artificial tear solution : ( 9582X ) Allergan Refresh Tears .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Evaluation 2 Artificial Tears . Evaluation TBUT , Tear Meniscus Height Tear Thickness
DOC.criteria: 1 . Normal , healthy volunteer 18 year old 2 . Males females 3 . Any race ethnic background 1 . Corneal refractive surgery within 6 month study . 2 . Contact lens use day examination . 3 . Corneal ectasia
